channel.title: PkMadness 614, Veteran Server
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/8VzNybL.png[/img]
The most advanced 614 server, Spawn & PvP only! This server has been up for over a year and a half.
Our dedicated forums! [url=http://pkmadness.org/forums]http://pkmadness.org/forums[/url] Our Home page! [url=http://pkmadness.org]http://pkmadness.org[/url] Download the Client (Recommended) [url=http://pkmadness.org/download]http://pkmadness.org/download.jar[/url]
Features: - Update Server - 100% Bank Pins - Clan Wars Minigame - Bounty Hunter Targets - Fight Pits - Clan Wars - Duel Arena - Fullscreen support & HD - Custom Titles - Character design - Auth vote system - Join us now for more to see!
